name: pdf-paraparatrans2
postCreateCommand: rm -f .git/hooks/pre-push || true && git config --local filter.lfs.required false && git config --local filter.lfs.clean "cat" && git config --local filter.lfs.smudge "cat" && git config --local filter.lfs.process "" && git config --local --unset lfs.repositoryformatversion || true && mkdir -p data && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
